pr_title: core-mgmt, support a shared context for all LRO requests

timeline.message: support a shared context for all LRO requests

timeline.bodyText: What is the difference between these two contexts?
timeline.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText:
Context is the usual one for HttpPipeline.
PollingContext is one that saves activation response / latest response / and other key/value pairs, for LRO.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: use a default overload for backward compatibility
